Wanchai Ferry bụ ụdị nri a na nri na China nke General Mills nwere. Mgbọrọgwụ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ malitere na afo 1972 mgbe Chong Kin-wo - nke a na-akpọkarị Madame Chong - malitere ire dumplings, azụmahịa nke dugara na aha njirimara ya "eze nwanyị na-adọrọ adọrọ" na nguzobe ụlọ ọrụ Wanchai Ferry Peking Dumpling n'afo1985. N'afọ 1997, ụlọ ọrụ Pillsbury sonyeere Wanchai Ferry nke mere ka akara ahụ bụrụ akụkụ nke General Mills mgbe e nwetara Pillsbury n'afọ 2001.

Akara ahụ ka bụ kwá ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ihe na China na onye ndu n'ahịa ya. Ebumnuche nke ihe oriri maka ahịa emba America na Europe. N'afọ ndị ikpeazụ ya, Madame Chong jere ozi dị ka onye ndụmọdụ na General Mills na-etinye aka na ọkwa mmepe ikpeazụ na ịnakwere ụdị. E webatara ihe ndị ahụ na obodoFrance n'oge opupu ihe ubi nke afọ 2007 na United States of America n'oge ọkọchị nke afọ 2007. N'afọ 2009, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ wepụtara nri eka a na nri na abalị oyi.
Chong Kin-wo nwụrụ na Febụwarị 12, n,'afo 2019, mgbe ọ bataafọ 75.
